description.p: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the weapon. On hit: the weapon's damage dice + your applicable modifier.

sheet.description: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the weapon. On hit: the weapon's damage dice + your applicable modifier.

description.p: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the weapon. On hit: the weapon's damage dice + your applicable modifier.

sheet.description: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the weapon. On hit: the weapon's damage dice + your applicable modifier.

description.p: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the hilt of the weapon, possibly dazing them. On hit: The target takes 1d4 kinetic damage and must make a Constitution saving throw: DC:8 + proficiency bonus + your applicable modifier. On a failed save, the target becomes dazed (dazed: has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws, can't take Reactions and loses the Dexterity bonus to their AC). On a successful save, the target doesn't get dazed.

sheet.description: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the hilt of the weapon, possibly dazing them. On hit: The target takes 1d4 kinetic damage and must make a Constitution saving throw: DC:8 + proficiency bonus + your applicable modifier. On a failed save, the target becomes dazed. On a successful save, the target doesn't get dazed.

description.p: As an Action, Make a sweeping melee attack with the weapon against all creatures standing in a 15 foot horizontal line originating from you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your applicable modifier). A creature takes the weapon's damage dice without modifiers on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

sheet.description: As an Action, Make a sweeping melee attack with the weapon against all creatures standing in a 15 foot horizontal line originating from you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes the weapon's damage dice without modifiers on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

description.p: As an Action, Blast multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes the weapon's damage dice + Dexterity modifier. On a successful save, the target takes half damage.

sheet.description: As an Action, Blast multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes the weapon's damage dice + Dexterity modifier. On a successful save, the target takes half damage.

description.p: As an Action, Flame multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes the weapon's damage dice + Dexterity modifier and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn.

sheet.description: As an Action, Flame multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes the weapon's damage dice + Dexterity modifier and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn.

description.p: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the weapon while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: the weapon's damage dice without modifiers.

sheet.description: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the weapon while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: the weapon's damage dice without modifiers.

description.p: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the weapon while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: the weapon's damage dice without modifiers.

sheet.description: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the weapon while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: the weapon's damage dice without modifiers.

description.p: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the back end of the weapon. On hit: the weapon's damage dice without modifiers.

sheet.description: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the back end of the weapon. On hit: the weapon's damage dice without modifiers.

description.p: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the weapon at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

sheet.description: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the weapon at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

description.p: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the stealth pistol at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

sheet.description: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the stealth pistol. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

description.p: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the weapon at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.

sheet.description: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the weapon at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.

description.p: Whip: Action; Use the fiber cord whip attachment. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier). On a failed save, the target is restrained. While restrained, the target can use an action on their turn to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). On a failed save, they remain restrained. On a successful save, they are freed. You can't use bonus actions or hold something in that hand while restraining someone.

sheet.description: Action: Use the whip attachment to restrain a target.

description.p: Action; After the weapon's reload capacity is expended, take a full Action to fully reload your weapon.

sheet.description: Action; After the weapon's reload capacity is expended, take a full Action to fully reload your weapon.

p.em: 1d6 energy, power cell, range 50/200, Reload 16, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This standard sidearm fires concentrated energy bolts. It uses power cells and has a high capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the blaster pistol. On hit: 1d6 energy + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the blaster pistol while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 energy without modifiers.

p.em: 1d6 energy damage, range 80/320, reload 4, two-handed, choose Strength or Dexterity modifier

description.p: This energy bow fires concentrated bolts of energy. It uses power cells and requires reloading after 4 shots.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the energy bow. On hit: 1d6 energy + your Strength or Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the energy bow while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 energy without modifiers.

p.em: 1d4 ion, power cell, range 40/160, Reload 16, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This pistol fires ion blasts that can disrupt droids and electronics. It uses power cells and has a high capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the ion pistol. On hit: 1d4 ion + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the ion pistol while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d4 ion without modifiers.

p.em: 1d4 sonic, power cell, range 30/120, Reload 16, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This pistol emits powerful sonic waves that can disorient targets. It uses power cells and has a high capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the sonic pistol. On hit: 1d4 sonic + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the sonic pistol while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d4 sonic without modifiers.

p.em: 1d4 cold, power cell, range 30/120, Reload 8, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This pistol fires freezing blasts that can chill targets. It uses power cells.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the cryo pistol. On hit: 1d4 cold + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the cryo pistol while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d4 cold without modifiers.

p.em: 1d6 kinetic, slug cartridge, range 40/160, Reload 16, requires Strength 11 to use, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This pistol fires kinetic slugs. It uses slug cartridges and requires Strength 11 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the slugthrower pistol. On hit: 1d6 kinetic + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the slugthrower pistol while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 kinetic without modifiers.

p.em: 1d6 acid, power cell, range 45/180, Reload 12, requires Strength 11 to use, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This pistol fires corrosive blasts. It uses power cells and requires Strength 11 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the disruptor pistol. On hit: 1d6 acid + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the disruptor pistol while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 acid without modifiers.

p.em: 1d6 energy, power cell, silent, two-handed, Reload 6, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This silent blaster pistol fires concentrated energy bolts without sound. It uses power cells and requires two hands to operate.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the stealth pistol. On hit: 1d6 energy + your Dexterity modifier.
• Dart: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the stealth pistol at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

element.name: Wrist Launcher with Wrist Blaster Attachment

p.strong: Wrist Launcher with Wrist Blaster Attachment

p.em: 1d6 energy, disguised, can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon, power cell, range 30/120, Reload 8, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This wrist-mounted launcher with blaster attachment fires energy bolts. It can't be disarmed, you can still use your hand but can't use the weapon when holding something.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the Wrist Launcher with Wrist Blaster Attachment. On hit: 1d6 energy + your Dexterity modifier.
• Quick Shot: As a Bonus Action, Make a quick hipfire shot with the Wrist Launcher with Wrist Blaster Attachment while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 energy without modifiers.
This wrist-mounted launcher with dart attachment. (can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon)
• Dart: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the Wrist Launcher with Dart Attachment at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.
This wrist-mounted launcher with rocket attachment. (can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon)
• Rocket: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the Wrist Launcher with Rocket Attachment at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.

element.name: Wrist Launcher with FiberCord Whip Attachment

p.strong: Wrist Launcher with FiberCord Whip Attachment

p.em: fibercord whip (15 feet line, The target must make a DC 8 + proficiency + Dexterity modifier, Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is restrained. On a successful save, the target isn't restrained. If the target is restrained he target can on their turn use an Action to do a Strength saving throw against 8 + proficiency + Strength modifier of the restrainer. On a failed save, the targets stays restrained. On a successful save, the target is freed. The Restrainer can't use Bonus Actions or hold something in that hand when restraining someone, Dexterity modifier)

description.p: This wrist-mounted launcher with fiber cord whip attachment. (can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon)

• Whip: Action; 15 feet line, The target must make a DC 8 + proficiency + Dexterity modifier, Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is restrained. On a successful save, the target isn't restrained. If the target is restrained he target can on their turn use an Action to do a Strength saving throw against 8 + proficiency + Strength modifier of the restrainer. On a failed save, the targets stays restrained. On a successful save, the target is freed. The Restrainer can't use Bonus Actions or hold something in that hand when restraining someone.

p.em: Wristflame (1d10 fire, Reload 2, canister, 15 feet line, Dexterity modifier), Flame

description.p: This wrist-mounted launcher with flame attachment. (can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon)

• Flame: As an Action, Flame multiple targets in a 15 feet cone in front of you. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes 1d10 fire + your Dexterity modifier and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn.

p.em: 1d8 energy, power cell, range 105/420, Reload 12, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This standard military rifle fires concentrated energy bolts. It uses power cells and has a moderate capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the blaster rifle. On hit: 1d8 energy + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d8 acid, power cell, range 120/470, Reload 9, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rifle fires corrosive blasts that can dissolve armor and flesh. It uses power cells.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the disruptor rifle. On hit: 1d8 acid + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d12 energy, power cell, range 90/360, Reload 4, requires Strength 17 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This massive bowcaster fires powerful energy bolts that can knock targets back. It uses power cells and has a very low capacity. Requires Strength 17 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the heavy bowcaster. On hit: 1d12 energy + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d6 ion, power cell, range 80/320, Reload 8, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rifle fires ion bolts that can disable droids and electronics. It uses power cells and has a moderate capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the ion rifle. On hit: 1d6 ion + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d8 sonic, power cell, range 80/320, Reload 8, requires Strength 11 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rifle emits powerful sonic waves that can disorient targets. It uses power cells and has a low capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the sonic rifle. On hit: 1d8 sonic + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d8 kinetic, slug cartridge, range 105/420, Reload 12, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rifle fires solid metal slugs using electromagnetic acceleration. It uses slug cartridges and has a moderate capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the slugthrower rifle. On hit: 1d8 kinetic + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 2d4 cold, power cell, range 50/200, Reload 4, requires Strength 11 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rifle fires cryogenic blasts that can freeze targets. It uses power cells and has a very low capacity. Requires Strength 11 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the cryo rifle. On hit: 2d4 cold + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d10 ion, power cell, range 120/470, Reload 1, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This powerful railgun accelerates metal slugs to incredible speeds using electromagnetic fields. It uses power cells and has a very low capacity.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the railgun. On hit: 1d10 ion + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 2d4 lightning, power cell, can hit a secondary target within 10 feet of the primary target: 1d4 lightning, range 60/240, Reload 9, requires Strength 11 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This weapon fires arcing bolts of electricity that can chain to nearby targets. It uses power cells and has a low capacity. Requires Strength 11 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the arc caster. On hit: 2d4 lightning + your Dexterity modifier.

p.em: 1d12 energy, power cell, 150/600, Reload 2, requires Strength 13 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This precision long-range rifle fires concentrated energy bolts with exceptional accuracy. It uses power cells and has a very low capacity. Requires Strength 13 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the sniper rifle. On hit: 1d12 energy + your Dexterity modifier.
• Dart: As an Action, Shoot a Dart with the sniper rifle at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the dart.

p.em: 2d10 energy, power cell, range 75 feet cone, Reload 4, requires Strength 13 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rapid-fire weapon unleashes a devastating cone of energy bolts. It uses power cells and has a very low capacity. Requires Strength 13 to use.

• Blast: As an Action, Blast multiple targets in a 75 feet cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes 2d10 energy + your Dexterity modifier. On a successful save, the target takes half damage.

p.em: 2d6 fire, canister, range 55 feet cone, Reload 2, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This weapon unleashes a devastating cone of flames. It uses fuel canisters and has a very low capacity.

• Flame: As an Action, Flame multiple targets in a 55 feet cone in front of you. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes 2d6 fire + your Dexterity modifier and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn.

p.em: 1d10 kinetic, slug cartridge, range 100/400, Reload 4, requires Strength 12 to use, two-handed, Dexterity modifier

description.p: This rapid-fire slugthrower rifle can unleash devastating bursts. It uses slug cartridges and has a very low capacity. Requires Strength 12 to use.
• Shoot: As an Action, Make a ranged attack with the cycler rifle. On hit: 1d10 kinetic + your Dexterity modifier.
The iconic weapon of the Jedi and Sith, a lightsaber projects a blade of pure plasma energy. It uses the Force to ignite and can be wielded with exceptional precision.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the lightsaber. On hit: 1d6 energy + your Dexterity or Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the lightsaber while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 energy without modifiers.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
A training lightsaber designed for Jedi initiates, this weapon projects a shorter plasma blade and is easier to handle than a full lightsaber.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the lightstaff. On hit: 1d6/2d4 energy + your Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the lightstaff while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6/2d4 energy without modifiers.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

p.em: 2d6 energy damage, two-handed, requires Dexterity 13 to use, Strength modifier

description.p: This unique lightsaber design features a crossguard of plasma blades that protect the wielder's hands. It requires exceptional dexterity to use safely. Requires Dexterity 13 to use.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the crossguard saber. On hit: 2d6 energy + your Strength modifier.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This exotic weapon consists of a handle that projects a flexible plasma whip. It can strike at enemies up to 10 feet away and requires great skill to wield effectively.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the lightwhip. On hit: 1d6 energy + your Dexterity modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the lightwhip while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6 energy without modifiers.
A more powerful lightsaber design used by skilled Force users. It can be wielded with one or two hands for increased damage.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the martial lightsaber. On hit: 1d8/1d10 energy + your Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the martial lightsaber while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d8/1d10 energy without modifiers.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

p.em: 1d10 energy, two-handed, reach: 10 feet, requires Dexterity 11 to use, Strength modifier

description.p: This extended lightsaber design provides superior reach in combat. It requires good dexterity to handle the longer weapon effectively. Requires Dexterity 11 to use.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the lightsaber pike. On hit: 1d10 energy + your Strength modifier.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This deadly weapon features plasma blades extending from both ends of the hilt. It requires exceptional skill to wield safely and effectively.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the double bladed lightsaber. On hit: 1d8 energy + your Dexterity or Strength modifier.

• Slash: As an Action, Make a sweeping melee attack with the double bladed lightsaber against all creatures standing in a 15 foot hoziontal line originating from you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity or Strength modifier). A creature takes 1d8 energy without modifiers on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
• Back Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a double bladed weapon, make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

p.em: 1d6/2d4 kinetic, versatile, thrown range 25/75, Strength modifier, one-handed

description.p: This spear features a vibrating blade that enhances its cutting power. It can be used in melee combat or thrown at enemies.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrospear. On hit: 1d6/2d4 kinetic + your Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrospear while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6/2d4 kinetic without modifiers.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This small blade features a vibrating edge that enhances its cutting power. It can be used for precise melee attacks or thrown at enemies.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrodagger. On hit: 1d4 kinetic + your Dexterity or Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrodagger while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d4 kinetic without modifiers.
This staff features vibrating blades that enhance its striking power. It can be wielded with one or two hands for increased damage.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrostaff. On hit: 1d6/2d4 kinetic + your Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrostaff while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d6/2d4 kinetic without modifiers.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This deadly weapon features vibrating blades on both ends. It requires exceptional skill to wield effectively in combat.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the vibro double-blade. On hit: 1d8 kinetic + your Dexterity or Strength modifier.

• Slash: As an Action, Make a sweeping melee attack with the vibro double-blade against all creatures standing in a 15 foot hoziontal line originating from you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity or Strength modifier). A creature takes 1d8 kinetic without modifiers on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
• Back Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a double bladed weapon, make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
This staff delivers powerful electric shocks to enemies. It requires exceptional skill to wield effectively in combat.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the electrostaff. On hit: 1d6 lightning + your Dexterity or Strength modifier.

• Slash: As an Action, Make a sweeping melee attack with the electrostaff against all creatures standing in a 15 foot hoziontal line originating from you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity or Strength modifier). A creature takes 1d6 lightning without modifiers on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
• Back Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a double bladed weapon, make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
This sword features a vibrating blade that enhances its cutting power. It can be wielded with one or two hands for increased damage.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrosword. On hit: 1d8/1d10 kinetic + your Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the vibrosword while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d8/1d10 kinetic without modifiers.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

p.em: 1d12 kinetic, two-handed, requires Dexterity 11 to use, Strength modifier

description.p: This massive axe features a vibrating blade that enhances its destructive power. It requires good dexterity to handle the heavy weapon effectively. Requires Dexterity 11 to use.
• Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)

p.em: 1d10 kinetic, two-handed, reach: 10 feet, requires Dexterity 11 to use, Strength modifier

description.p: This extended polearm features a vibrating blade that enhances its striking power. It provides superior reach in combat. Requires Dexterity 11 to use.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the vibropike. On hit: 1d10 kinetic + your Strength modifier.
• Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
This flexible weapon delivers electric shocks to enemies up to 10 feet away. It requires great skill to wield effectively.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the electrowhip. On hit: 1d4 lightning + your Dexterity modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the electrowhip while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d4 lightning without modifiers.
This compact weapon delivers electric shocks to enemies. It can be wielded with great precision and speed.
• Strike: As an Action, Make a melee attack with the electrobaton. On hit: 1d4 lightning + your Dexterity or Strength modifier.
• Off-Hand Strike: As a Bonus Action, Make a melee attack with the electrobaton while wielding it in your off-hand. On hit: 1d4 lightning without modifiers.
Rocket Launcher
Martial Blaster
Range 100/350, Reload 1, requires Strength 13 to use, two-handed
A heavy rocket launcher that fires explosive rockets at targets. Requires Strength 13 to use.
Actions:
• Rocket: As an Action, Shoot a Rocket with the rocket launcher at a target. On hit: Damage and conditions depend on the rocket.
